website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for overseas travelers, hikers and campers, due to its heavy concentration of DEET. Those who want to treat clothing, however, might consider the Sawyer first.
pros: Ideal container size for traveling and camping
Requires minimal amount of product to be effective
cons: Not effective against some DEET-resistant insects
Nozzle is hard to control while spraying

customer_reviews.title: I bought for use in Thailand. I'm not sure ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought for use in Thailand. I'm not sure if the particular shipment I got was old or what, but this was my leg after the first day. After I used another brand, I didn't have any other problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Works well, great size!
customer_reviews.text: I keep one of these in the console of my truck, ditto the wife's car, one in her purse, one in each vehicle's 1st aid kit, one in my range bag, and one in my go bag - Mosquitos, ticks, & chiggers *never* pass on an opportunity to try and eat me alive, so having good repellent available changes things from miserable to enjoyable! The repellent itself works well and even with the small packaging, they're still both cheap & small enough to have several scattered around so there's always one handy when we're out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Duke

customer_reviews.title: A necessary layer of protection
customer_reviews.text: Very effective. Holds up to sweat pretty well, but you need to apply more frequently if sweating a lot. In southeast Asia... Use in combination with permethrin-treated clothing. Added layers of protection include mosquito coils, bug spray, air conditioning where possible, and netting. Am constantly surprised by the numbers of ridiculous western travellers I meet who make no provision/preparation for insects. Better to over-protect: You do NOT want dengue or malaria. Or zika.
customer_reviews.author: LanceManion

customer_reviews.title: Effective - and small enough to have it with you!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfectly packaged to prevent leaks - and small enough to take with you in all types of bags. We took this with us on a 3 week trip and used it several times to avoid bites. Effective - and best of all, it was always with us so we actually used it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy T. Jaques

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact size for portability. On the downside, one bottle is barely enough to cover two people thoroughly. On the plus side, you can pry off the cap and refill it, then close it up and take it with you again.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Johncox

customer_reviews.title: Nice to carry in a small bag
customer_reviews.text: Used for a trip to Egypt, worked like a charm! Because it was so hot, I had to reapply a little more often than I would have liked. Causing the smell to become strong on me over a few hours. Not that anyone cared lol. I'm sure it would be fine in moderate temperatures. This size was nice and easy to carry around in a small bag, I used the entire thing container over the course of a 2 week trip.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree K

customer_reviews.title: mosquito magnet no more
customer_reviews.text: my family members call me the mosquito magnet. the mosquitoes love me. and call their friends and relatives to feed on me whenever i go for a walk But ever since i started using this stuff, they have been keeping their distance. So, I think it works. Go ahead and buy it before they develop a taste for the stuff.
customer_reviews.author: kavisanju

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to carry and that is why I purchased it expecting the result could be same as the description. However, not working at all when I was hiking in the mountains. I switch back to the spray even it is limited For carrying on the plane.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina YL

customer_reviews.title: 100% Reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Took this to Machu Picchu and man did it work wonders. I saw tourists everywhere with legs completely bitten up....and we didn't have a bite on us, nor did I look like I was karate chopping bugs away all day.
customer_reviews.author: BMcK

customer_reviews.title: 100% DEET. What you should be buying.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy those big dumb cans of 10% (or less) DEET and then douse yourself with tons of spray. A small spritz of 100% DEET on your backpack, or socks, or anywhere near exposed skin is great for keeping mosquitoes away. Great size, lasts for a long time considering how little you need per application.
customer_reviews.author: Dash

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: This your regular ole repellent with DEET. It works. The beauty is that it fits in my purse - which means it is available to actually use when needed. No leaks. No problem.
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: I always need this when traveling and it is super portable and effective!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon McBird

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for traveling. Kept me safe from getting attacked by a nest of dear flys.
customer_reviews.author: Littlemisy

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have this.
customer_reviews.text: Bite Protection on the go. It's great! I get but a lot during the summer and it's nice to have this in my purse whenever I need it without taking up room. Everyone should have this.
customer_reviews.author: JackieG

customer_reviews.title: Helped !
customer_reviews.text: I used the product in Jamaica where, last time, I returned home looking like I had chickenpox! I applied only outside my room and washed my hands and used baby wipes to clean my hands carefully. ||||We were traveling with a 7 month old little one and I was extremely concerned about keeping him safe and away from chemicals. Returned home with a few bites on my jaw and neck but was satisfied with the result. I wish, however, that I could find something organic that would keep the pesky little buggers away! rs away!.
customer_reviews.author: Francine Dembie

customer_reviews.title: A Spray a Day Keeps the Bugs Away!!!
customer_reviews.text: Give yourself a spray and you will see a change of attitude with mosquitoes and sorts. They will come near you, maybe jump on you but will not bite or stay,
customer_reviews.author: Lavezzo

customer_reviews.title: Immediate Relief
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite bug spray! Low oder, works great. Plus, the size is convenient to slip into a pocket. Can’t live without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: The best bug spray I’ve ever used, will continue to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: JL8

customer_reviews.title: Repel 94098 100-Percent Deet Insect
customer_reviews.text: Yes it repels the flying bugs. I really like the small profile so I can put one in my pocket, another in the car and more in my camping gear. Also for those that show up with no repellant.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Nice !
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wedding welcome bags. Perfect travel size. No complains.
customer_reviews.author: JGRN

customer_reviews.title: Need I say more? Traveling inside and outside of ...
customer_reviews.text: Need I say more? Traveling inside and outside of the USA? Mosquitoes carry viruses and parasites. Mosquito-borne illnesses include Zika, malaria, West Nile virus, elephantiasis, dengue fever, yellow fever etc. And how about hiking in the US too?
customer_reviews.author: Q. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great Size for Backpacking
customer_reviews.text: Great size for backpacking in an area that's not too terribly bug-infested, but you just need a little something! :D
customer_reviews.author: PNWAudiophile

customer_reviews.title: I hate mosquitoes! Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: Small but still contains a lot of the product. I'm the only one that has to wear a higher concentration of deet in my group I travel with. If not, I will be anemic after one week on vacation from the blood sucking b#^&'s. I hate mosquitoes! Unfortunately, they love me.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: good small portable size
customer_reviews.text: have used larger size with good results - purchase these for glove box in car, saddle bag for horse, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Green

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super handy and compact. Haven't used it much yet, but seems to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: g

customer_reviews.title: Superb product, use as described
customer_reviews.text: Terrifying cause it is 100-percent but then, that's what I wanted. Was trying to ensure I didn't see a sucker on me and mosquitoes LOVE me, have for years. And I lived in the 3rd worlds of Paraguay and Ecuador where this spray would have been welcomed!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Drimmer

customer_reviews.title: great, kills moskitos and polishes plastic lights in vehicles ;-)
customer_reviews.text: great, kills moskitos and polishes plastic lights in vehicles ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Urszula K.

customer_reviews.title: Worked reasonably well to keep the mosquitos at bay in ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked reasonably well to keep the mosquitos at bay in yosemite. I got bit once or twice on a 3 day trip, but it was during peak bug season with swarms everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Chaney

customer_reviews.title: We live in a tick area and I like having this in my car
customer_reviews.text: We live in a tick area and I like having this in my car. Nice size, easy to have in the glove box when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna F. Schlotman

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: 100% deet is overkill; 40% is just as effective. Sprayer did not spray, it streamed.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Love the
customer_reviews.text: Tested it the other day and it works just as expected. Love the portability
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Repel
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really really works! Used it last summer, fit in a travel case. 4 stars only because it lasted a few times. Knew it was a small container, but only lasted a couple evenings. Will purchase Repel again
customer_reviews.author: C. HM

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bug Me!
customer_reviews.text: This trusty little bottle has accompanied me on several trips where repelling mosquitos was a matter of life or death. I obviously would like a deet free product...but when you need to keep them off you this is the stuff to use!
customer_reviews.author: jrvtgs

customer_reviews.title: If you can stand it
customer_reviews.text: There are others that are more convenient, easier to apply and smell better. However, this stuff flat works (if it doesn't knock you out when you first apply it). If you absolutely don't want to get bit, this is the stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Norris D. Boyd Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this packable/purse sized spray. Works as advertised. No bites yet.
customer_reviews.author: wrknnwfTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Love the convenience
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the end of the season so I can't speak to its effectivenesd but I live the portability and convenience. The smell isn't great but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Edagirl

customer_reviews.title: I hate relying on deet to repel mosquitoes and prefer natural ...
customer_reviews.text: I hate relying on deet to repel mosquitoes and prefer natural repellents, but there are simply some times when the natural stuff does not cut it, like when you're backpacking on an island with mosquitoes so vicious that they chase you in swarms so thick you can hardly see. This stuff smells like hell but was a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong, but works
customer_reviews.text: This is strong, use sparingly. I use it as a backup if my more natural products aren't working very well.
customer_reviews.author: CamM

customer_reviews.title: Works, but it's DEET
customer_reviews.text: When all else fails, this works. Lemongrass essential oil works just as well for me...90% of the time. This is for the really pesky ones.
customer_reviews.author: Deedee

customer_reviews.title: Mosquito's hate this!
customer_reviews.text: This works terrible as a breath freshener but as a mosquito repellent, you can't get better than 100% deet. Just use a little and the mozzies stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bigelow

customer_reviews.title: Great for your Hiking First-aid Kit / Emergency Kit
customer_reviews.text: Works well. 100 percent DEET, so the mosquitoes really stay away. Small container so you can slip it into your emergency kit.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Works well super strong. Apply in small amounts can make you
customer_reviews.text: Works well super strong . Apply in small amounts can make you sick
customer_reviews.author: Karold T. Krause

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I recently went to Africa and this was perfect for traveling. It is a great size that can fit in a purse and it works very well! No Malaria! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jenessa Bilbro

customer_reviews.title: Bugs off
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says. It has DEET. But it works. That simple. And portable. Fits easily into purse or backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Babs21

customer_reviews.title: keeps bugs  off
customer_reviews.text: worked great kept mosquitos away on a Canadian trip and was the right size for the tackle bag. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: onedermutt

customer_reviews.title: The best!!
customer_reviews.text: Mosquitoes have been especially bad this summer and fall. I depend on this Repel to defend myself against them! It works!!
customer_reviews.author: Good Grandma!

customer_reviews.title: no bug problem
customer_reviews.text: This stuff worked great. We just got back from vacation, where they had warned us of sand fleas. We did not have any trouble with them due to applying Repel 100. And the small pen size was perfect to carry with us to re-apply.
customer_reviews.author: Badger Girl

customer_reviews.title: great travel size
customer_reviews.text: In the summer I keep one in my bag in case I find myself outside at dusk and feel the mosquitoes. Repel works great and doesn't smell too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Ndela

customer_reviews.title: Best product for mosquito protection - PERIOD !
customer_reviews.text: Great product ! Arrived quickly and as I've used this product before - in the deep words of ALASKA where mosquitos will carry you away ! IT SIMPLY WORKS like no other product - but beware it is 100 % DEET, apply carefully - a little goes a long way !
customer_reviews.author: LightsF15

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well detering mosquitos and is the perfect travel size.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Little Container Packing a Huge Punch!
customer_reviews.text: On a recent camping trip I ran out of my bug spray and a friend lent me this spray. It is tiny, so perfect for backpacking and super effective! I had no problems with ticks, flys or mosquitos. Not a huge fan of Deet, and where possible use Skin So Soft, though for back woods hiking I won't risk it.the potential of getting bitten or have a tick hitch-hike a ride. Totally worth the piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Lori ATLTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Different parts of the world require different repellents, this one works great for those Minnesota mosquitoes. We only use this one when necessary as it is tough on the liver, better than getting West Nile fever. Also, the travel size is great for a weekend trip.
customer_reviews.author: old fashioned girl

customer_reviews.title: nice for travel
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our trip to the Caribbean. Perfect size for travel and works well (on mosquitos). Only thing was I did not see anywhere before buying that it comes with two. So I ordered "two" and got four. :) Even better.
customer_reviews.author: Trudred

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I travel and needed a light weight Insect repellant. I haven't used it yet. Hence I don't want to comment on it's effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hersam

product_meta.title: Repel 100 Insect Repellent, Pen-Size Pump Spray, 0.475-Ounce
product_meta.description: Size:0.475-Ounce| Pattern Name:Pack of 1Outdoor enthusiasts know that when the going gets tough, so should their insect repellent. However extreme the activity or terrain, there's a Repel insect repellent designed to offer dependable coverage that lasts as long as you need it to. Repel products make effective mosquito protection simple under any circumstance – so you can heed the call of the wild wherever the trail takes you. Repel 100 Insect Repellent provides you with up to 10 hours of protection. Spending a long time outdoors can be refreshing, but mosquitoes can bring that to a halt. This convenient 0.475 ounce pen-size pump spray can be easily stored with whatever gear your adventure requires. Formulated for severe insect conditions, Repel 100 Insect Repellent contains 98.11% DEET. Repel mosquitoes that may transmit the Zika, West Nile, Dengue and Chikungunya viruses, as well as ticks, gnats, biting flies, chiggers and fleas. Extreme conditions call for strong protection. Make Repel 100 Insect Repellent your bug spray essential. DEET has been used as an insect repellent in the United States for more than 50 years. It’s recommended for those spending longer periods of time outdoors, in more heavily infested conditions. Recommended by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention for effective, long-lasting protection against mosquitoes, DEET is also an effective repellent for ticks. DEET-based products are available in a wide variety of Repel formulas, including aerosols, sprays and wipes.
feature_bullets: REPELS: Create a barrier against mosquitoes, including those that may transmit the Zika, West Nile, Dengue and Chikungunya viruses, ticks, gnats, biting flies, chiggers and fleas.
FORMULATED FOR SEVERE INSECT CONDITIONS: Contains 98.11% DEET for protection in heavily infested conditions.
PROTECTS FOR UP TO 10 HOURS: Enjoy the outdoors without the bite – provides long-lasting protection, so you don't have to limit your adventure because of bugs.
ALSO REPELS TICKS, GNATS, BITING FLIES, CHIGGERS & FLEAS: Create a barrier against annoying bugs that can spoil the outdoors.
PEN-SIZE PUMP SPRAY: Perfect for outdoor travel – the compact size stores perfectly with whatever adventure gear you're taking that day.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
